00020 #include "DisplayObject.h"              
00021 
00022 #include <iostream>
00023 using namespace std;
00024 
00025 namespace TenUI {
00026 
00027         class DisplayObjectContainer : public DisplayObject {
00028         private:
00029                 GLuint displayListID;
00030                 GLuint selection_displayListID;
00031                 bool _redraw;
00032                 bool _redraw_sel;
00033                 
00034         protected:
00035                 vector< shared_ptr<DisplayObject> > children;
00036         
00037         public: 
00038                 // constructor
00039                 DisplayObjectContainer( const shared_ptr<DisplayObject>& p, int x=0, int y=0, unsigned int w=0, unsigned int h=0, double rot=0.0, double s=1.0, double o=1.0)
00040                         :DisplayObject(p,x,y,w,h,rot,s,o){ }
00041                 virtual ~DisplayObjectContainer();
00042                 
00043                 /***********************************/
00044                 /*     Hierarchy Getter/Setters    */
00045                 /***********************************/  
00046                 virtual void addChild( shared_ptr<DisplayObject> child );               
00047                 virtual void removeChild( shared_ptr<DisplayObject> child );
00048                 virtual const vector< shared_ptr<DisplayObject> >& getChildren();
00049 
00050                 /***********************************/
00051                 /*        Init/Update Methods      */
00052                 /***********************************/
00053                 virtual void init();
00054                 virtual void update();
00055                 virtual void deinit();  
00056 
00057 
00058                 /***********************************/
00059                 /*      Extended Draw Methods      */
00060                 /***********************************/
00061                 // Self is always drawn before the Children
00062                 // This makes it so children appear ontop of their Parent
00063                 virtual void drawSelf() = 0;
00064                 virtual void drawChildren();
00065                 
00066                 void redraw();
00067                 
00068                 /***********************************/
00069                 /*           Draw Methods          */
00070                 /***********************************/
00071                 virtual void draw();
00072                 
00073                 
00074         };
00075 }
